A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Contrary to what critics say\, this film does not honor the legacy of Star Wars. It insults the spirit of Star Wars and I felt deeply betrayed when I came out of the theater. 

The actors do a wonderful job with what they were given and their performances were the only redemption. Unfortunately\, those actors were given a script which was 75% comedy\, quips\, and gimmicks.

I suppose I would say the tone of the film was inappropriate for a genuine Star Wars adventure.
